title: [DIP-5] Yearn vault for $DUSD stablecoin liquidity
body:
Currently, yearn liquidity is being migrated to v2 vaults. The withdrawal fee from the vaults is [turned off](https://twitter.com/iearnfinance/status/1393431649698951169) and hence this is a good time to perform the migration of the underlying $DUSD liquidity which was proposed in the Q2 [roadmap](https://medium.com/defidollar/defidollar-roadmap-449465749537).

Yearn vault choices:

1. crvSAAVE: Curve pool composed of aSUSD and aDAI. This pool was proposed by the DefiDollar team earlier. [Details](https://medium.com/defidollar/adai-asusd-curve-pool-c4cda9006142). This pool currently has $CRV and $AAVE incentives.

2. 3CRV: The curve pool with the highest trading volume but a high reliance on centralized stablecoins.

3. yUSD (yCRV vault): The $DUSD protocol currently parks liquidity in the yUSD v1 vault. Choosing this option would mean a liquidity migration from v1 to v2 vault.
author: 0x08F7506E0381f387e901c9D0552cf4052A0740a4
